name: Frostfire Gauntlet
tooltip:
Frostfire Gauntlet

Cost: 3200
+50 Armor
+350 Health
+25 Magic Resistance
+15 Ability Haste

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters.

UNIQUE Passive - Snowbind: Basic attacks create a frost field that slows enemies within by 25% (+ 4% per 1000 maximum health) for 1.5 seconds (4 second cooldown).

UNIQUE Passive - Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 100 health and 7.5% increased size.
